fields.name: Farsight Orb (Trinket)
fields.description: Limited to 1 Trinket. *Level 9+ required to upgrade. UNIQUE Active: Reveals an area up to 4000 units away for 2 seconds. Enemy champions found will be revealed for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown). Also places a visible ward in the area that lasts 60 seconds. This ward is untargetable by allies. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
